name: rubbery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling or bending like rubber: The cheese wasn't very nice - it was rubbery. If you cook it for too long it will have a rubbery texture. My legs felt all rubbery (= weak) after the race.
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases

bendy

pliant

slacken
tensile
unstayed
unstuck
yielding
See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
elastic and difficult to break, like rubber: I don’t like squid, it’s too rubbery.
Rubbery also means feeling weak: His legs were rubbery.
